articles.description: Spanish prosecutors open a preliminary sex abuse investigation into football federation president Luis Rubiales.
articles.title: Prosecutors open sex abuse investigation into Rubiales

articles.description: British qualifier Lily Miyazaki earns her first win at a Grand Slam with a confident display against Margarita Betova on day one of the US Open.
articles.title: Britain's Miyazaki wins on US Open debut

articles.description: World number one Iga Swiatek begins her title defence on day one of the US Open, with Britain's Lily Miyazaki also in action - follow live.
articles.title: US Open 2023: Swiatek begins title defence on day one - listen & text

articles.description: Match of the Day 2's Alex Scott is joined by Alan Shearer and Micah Richards to discuss the new time wasting rules which have already led to two red cards in the Premier League.
articles.title: New rules putting pressure on referees - Shearer on time wasting

articles.description: Norwegian Viktor Hovland's spectacular end to the season is the result of many hours with his unorthodox new coach, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: 'Resilient Hovland chips away to hit new heights'

articles.description: Iga Swiatek begins her defence of the US Open title with an emphatic first-round victory as eighth seed Maria Sakkari crashes out.
articles.title: Swiatek breezes into second round at US Open

articles.description: Watch the weekend's funniest moments as Burnley's mascots dress to impress, James Maddison makes some new friends and Roy Hodgson has zipper problems.
articles.title: 2 Good 2 Bad: Watch the weekend's funniest moments

articles.description: Dominic Thiem wins his first Grand Slam match since the 2021 Australian Open with a straight-set victory over Alexander Bublik.
articles.title: 'It means a lot' - Thiem wins first Slam match in two years

articles.description: Commonwealth Games 10,000m champion Eilish McColgan reveals she spent spent five "distressing" days in hospital last week to address a "fluid leak" in her spine.
articles.title: McColgan spends five days in hospital with spine issue

articles.description: Wolves midfielder Matheus Nunes will be fined after missing training in an effort to secure a move to Manchester City.
articles.title: Nunes stops training in bid to force Man City move
